title: John Boehner wins re-election as Speaker of the House âÂ as it happened | US news | The Guardian
summary: boehner wins reelection as speaker with 216 votes .
white house : obama would veto keystone bill .
interactive : are you reflected in the new congress ?

text: we 're going to wrap our live blog coverage of kickoff day for the 114th congress .

here 's a summary of where things stand : john boehner handily won reelection as speaker of the house , despite 24 republicans voting against him ( plus one who voted present ) , in the biggest such show of dissension in a century .
the senate wasted no time in introducing the text of a bill to compel construction of the keystone xl pipeline .
the white house was just as quick to promise a veto .
mike memoli ( @ mikememoli ) let the record show the 114th congress was just over an hour old before the white house issued a veto threat senator mitch mcconnell was sworn in as majority leader .
a lot of hard work awaits , he told colleagues .
many important opportunities await too .
vice president joe biden greeted senators and their families for a ceremonial swearing-in .
it was , as usual , a colorful affair .
visit cnn 's chris moody 's twitter feed for biden gifs that keep on giving : chris moody ( @ moody ) i do n't even know what 's going on anymore at this biden thing .
( h/t @ twitterid )
c-span draws back as the members trickle out of the house , and the chamber goes mostly quiet .
it was n't that awkward ?
nowthis ( @ nowthisnews ) john boehner and nancy pelosi just shared an embrace awkward enough for the next two years .
senator rand paul acknowledges the vote for him for speaker of the house .
the voter , rep. clawson , is a first-term congressman from florida .
senator rand paul ( @ senrandpaul ) @ repcurtclawson thanks !
when do i start ?
# standwithrand ( h/t @ twitterid )
boehner is done .
he spoke more briefly than pelosi .
i 'm ready to take the oath of office , he says .
rep john conyers of michigan , dean of the house as its longest-serving member ( in office since 1965 ) , administers it .
then boehner swears in everybody else .
congratulations , he says .
they cheer themselves .
there are some whoops .
boehner says we 're glad and humbled to begin work in the people 's house .
cspan ( @ cspan ) seen on c-span : @ twitterid - live on c-span # 114congress
pelosi is winding up her speech with an introduction of boehner .
she hands him the gavel .
fun infographic from the washington post about how long we can expect to wait until the legislatin ' starts : chris cillizza ( @ thefix ) congress is back .
how long before we can expect new legislation ?
boehner arrives at the dais along with nancy pelosi , the minority leader , who is speaking .
she notes that many members of the new york delegation were not in attendance because they were at former governor mario cuomo 's funeral .

documents.title: boehner wins reelection as speaker with 216 votes
text: jeff zeleny ( @ jeffzeleny ) .
@ speakerboehner re-elected speaker of house .
25 defections plus thrown away votes , but win is a win .
still no tea party center of gravity .
also receiving votes : pelosi 164 webster 12 gohmert 3 yoho 2 jordan 2 cooper 1 defazio 1 duncan 1 gowdy 1 lewis 1 mccarthy 1 senator paul 1 sessions 1 colin powell 1 present 1
the vice president is welcoming senators and their families as only he can .
howard mortman ( @ howardmortman ) # biden ryan lizza ( @ ryanlizza ) idea : kickstarter campaign for biden reality show that 's just him doing receiving lines in various locales .
the day 's not over yet but this truly will be difficult to top : chris cillizza ( @ thefix ) arizona rep. krysten sinema won swearing-in day .

although boehner has won reelection as house speaker , and in the first round of voting , the revolt against him was unusually sharp , the washington post notes : aaron blake ( @ aaronblakewp ) this is the biggest revolt on a speaker vote in at least 100 years
the voting is finished in the race for house speaker .
it appears that boehner has won easily , although his margin is unclear .
we 're waiting for the official count .
boehner gets to 200 votes .
on the senate side , vice president joe biden swears in and congratulates mitch mcconnell .
mike memoli ( @ mikememoli ) `` congratulations , mr. leader , '' @ twitterid says to sen. mcconnell after administering oath in old senate chamber

documents.title: white house : obama would veto keystone bill
text: as voting for speaker continues in the house , republicans in the senate have introduced their bill mandating construction of the keystone xl pipeline .
at which the white house has promised a veto : jennifer epstein ( @ jeneps ) earnest confirms keystone veto threat : `` if this bill passes this congress , the president would n't sign it either ''
how many votes boehner needs to win in the first round depends on how many members are present ( 401 ) and voting ( unclear ) .
with 15 republicans so far going against boehner ( we 're in the n 's ) , it appears he 's sailing to a double-digit victory .
doug mataconis ( @ dmataconis ) by most recent calculation , there would need to be 35 gop defectors to force a second ballot .
now other is up to 14 .
boehner 's at 88 .
make that 90 , with the two rep. jenkinses .
byron york ( @ byronyork ) looks like anti-boehner votes have already hit 2013 level , and we 're just at the gs .
( the vote is proceeding alphabetically . )
that 's eight against boehner so far and one present , according to a washington post count : robert costa ( @ costareports ) duncan of sc votes for gowdy .
we 're up to 8 nay votes on r side , plus one present
in the vote for the new house speaker , some members are going d ) none of the above .
votes have been cast for rand paul , who is a senator , and for colin powell , who is not in congress .
reid j. epstein ( @ reidepstein ) do n't let the guys who voted for rand paul or colin powell for house speaker ever tell you you 've wasted your vote on anyone .
they 're voting now for the next speaker of the house .
john bresnahan ( @ brespolitico ) all boehner needs is a majority of 401 members present and voting for speaker .
he may be reelected with 200 or so votes

documents.title: boehner challengers nominated
text: nominations are under way of the pretenders to boehner 's crown .
oklahoma 's jim bridenstine has nominated gohmert , the guardian 's amanda holpuch reports .
this is not about judge gohmert , this is about establishing a stronger check on the executive branch , bridenstine said .
amanda holpuch ( @ holpuch ) justin amash nominates jim jordan , some democrats laugh .
a kid did too .
orrin hatch was elected to the senate in 1976 .
only one senator has served longer : vermont 's patrick leahy , elected in 1976 .
doug mataconis ( @ dmataconis ) meanwhile in the senate , orrin hatch has been named senate president pro tempore
zzzzzzzing~~~ molly ball ( @ mollyesque ) boehner being the 2nd of 12 kids means he basically spent his childhood babysitting , which explains a lot about his current job .
the hill is counting republican house members who have withdrawn their support from boehner in advance of this afternoon 's election for house speaker .
they 're up to 15 no ' votes and 6 possible no ' votes .
that 's not enough .
it 's a heady day for boehner 's trio of challengers , though .
they are louie gohmert of texas , ted yoho of florida and daniel webster of florida .
daveweigel ( @ daveweigel ) gohmert now talking to yoho , slapping him on the back .
( oh in press gallery : `` gohmert 's winning the yoho-gohmert primary . '' )
daniel webster ( @ repwebster ) it appears i will be nominated for speaker of the house .
i am humbled and honored by the confidence many of my colleagues have placed in me .
say what you will about congress , there 's nothing like it for wit to whet on .
john r stanton ( @ dcbigjohn ) there 's more awkward hugging and touching going down on the house floor right now than at an 8th grade dance
boehner is now on the floor .
daveweigel ( @ daveweigel ) boehner tan status : peruvian mahogany .
howard mortman ( @ howardmortman )
the guardian 's amanda holpuch is in the house : amanda holpuch ( @ holpuch ) there is considerably more play-fighting on the house floor than i expected .
and i 'm not talking about the children .

also in attendance : sheldon adelson , the casino magnate who spent $ 13.2m on the 2014 midterm elections , plus at least $ 5m he reportedly gave to a republican super pac ( which do n't disclose donors ) .
dana bash ( @ danabashcnn ) here to celebrate new gop congress - sheldon adelson .
told me he 's been before & is thrilled to come # moneywellspent
new york 's peter king was one of many congressman to bring guests to the gaveling .
howard mortman ( @ howardmortman ) day one of congress means rare opportunity for c-span cameras to be in house chamber

documents.title: congress convenes
text: in session .
with a cable subscription you can watch it on cspan here .
so far lots of ambient chatter , some milling , scattered gladhanding .
there 's the gavel and they hush in the house .
just five minutes to go now until the convention of the historic 114th congress .

documents.title: interactive : are you reflected in the new congress ?
text: despite the arrival of a record number of women ( 104/535 ) , the first black woman republican ( mia love of utah ) and the first black senator elected from the deep south since reconstruction ( tim scott of south carolina ) , the new us congress is still largely male , largely white and almost all ( 92 % ) christian .

if you 're interested in how your census-level identity is reflected in the new legislature , or just would like to explore who 's representing america these days , we 'd invite you to spend some time with this nifty interactive tool .
if you 're a women , there are 104 people in congress like you , gender-wise .
( h/t @ twitterid )

documents.title: 114th congress : legislative priorities
text: what to expect out of the 114th ?
senate majority leader mitch mcconnell has said he would seek to reverse what he called the obama administration 's regulatory onslaught .
republicans have specifically called for legislation that would counteract the president 's health care law , carbon emissions regulations , executive actions on immigration and other measures .
republicans will introduce a bill on tuesday to force construction of the keystone xl pipeline , the guardian 's suzanne goldenberg reports .
the bill is expected to pass but it faces a potential presidential veto .
[ people ] are tired of inaction , mcconnell said at the weekend .
they want us to act .
what does active mean ?

to give you some examples , things like approving the keystone pipeline which would put a lot of people to work immediately , trying to do everything we can to push back against over-active bureaucracy of the current administration that has created much job loss .
for example , in my state the coal-mining industry .
incoming : senate majority leader mitch mcconnell arrives on capitol hill , 6 january , 2015 .

smialowski/afp/getty images mcconnell and the democratic white house believe there are areas of potential consensus around international trade deals , an overhaul of the tax code , and new revenue streams for infrastructure projects .
these are all areas where there does stand the potential for bipartisan agreement , and the president is certainly going to pursue them , the white house said monday .
the president is also going to pursue some other things the republicans may not like that he can do on his own .
senate minority leader harry reid novel typing that broke ribs and facial bones last week when a piece of home exercise equipment fell apart on him .
he 's calling in sick .
senator harry reid ( @ senatorreid ) working from home on doctor 's orders .
just wrapped up a good meeting with my leadership team .
the guardian 's amanda holpuch 's eye falls on a tranquil scene in washington .
hello and welcome to our live blog coverage of the first day of a brand new congress , the 114th .
lest the point escape anyone , mother nature has blessed the proceedings with several inches of snow , resulting in total gridlock in the washington area .
some members flying in at the last minute were expected to be tardy .
both the senate and the house of representatives are scheduled to come back to life at noon .
the spoils of the fantastic republican victory in the 2014 midterm elections will be on display .
the gop comes in with a whopping 246-188 majority in the house ( where there 's one vacant seat ) and a 54-44 majority in the senate ( plus two independents who will caucus with the democrats ) .
it 's a big day for mitch mcconnell , who ascends to senate majority leader after eight years in the minority leader slot .
but it appears likely to be a more exciting day for his counterpart in the house , speaker john boehner , who is facing an internal party challenge to his leadership , which he is expected to smite .
joe arnold ( @ joearnoldreport ) `` majority leader '' name plate installed on @ twitterid senate leadership door in capitol .
what will the gop do with its shiny new majorities ?
we 'll look ahead to the likely legislative battles and potential areas for agreement that could play out as the clock winds down on the barack obama presidency .
and we 'll take a closer look at who 's who in the new legislature .
join us as 2015 kicks off on capitol hill .
